name: SalHyperTalk
commands: Hello new boss!|I see you fight with the sword too!|Oh! Hyper is my name!
Sure do, Hyper. Believe me, you don't become a commander without the skill.
Spar with me!|I must test my swordcraft against a greater opponent!
How about you stick to fighting the enmies?|I'll consider it later.
Guy... He was a good man...|I must have them pay, all of them!
I'll see it done for you.
No! I must do it!|I have to avenge my friend!|GAH! I WILL HAVE YOUR HEADS!
Is there anything I can do for you?
Yeah! Stay out of my way.|I won't let anyone else dish out revenge!|I have to get rid... of this burning inside me...
Is there anything I can do to ease things...?
No.|I'll just...{br}Argh! I'll kill them, ALL OF THEM!
No! Stand back!|I have to do this! FEEL MY RAGE!
I am... too weak...|I couldn't stop it...
Our enemies are strong, if there's anything I can do to help...
I might be too weak...|But... Please, massacre them all... ALL OF THEM!|I want to see... THEIR BLOOD SPILLED!|AAAAAAAAARGH!
source:
multi_add_portrait;Sal;Right;Hyper;Left
if;game.check_alive('Pykroe') and game.check_alive('Guy')
    speak;Hyper;Hello new boss!|I see you fight with the sword too!|Oh! Hyper is my name!
    speak;Sal;Sure do, Hyper. Believe me, you don't become a commander without the skill.
    speak;Hyper;Spar with me!|I must test my swordcraft against a greater opponent!
    speak;Sal;How about you stick to fighting the enmies?|I'll consider it later.
    speak;Hyper;Aw...|Alright, hyah!
elif;game.check_alive('Pykroe') and game.check_dead('Guy')
    speak;Sal;I'm so sorry... Your friend...
    speak;Hyper;Guy... He was a good man...|I must have them pay, all of them!
    speak;Sal;I'll see it done for you.
    speak;Hyper;No! I must do it!|I have to avenge my friend!|GAH! I WILL HAVE YOUR HEADS!
    speak;Sal;Is there anything I can do for you?
    speak;Hyper;Yeah! Stay out of my way.|I won't let anyone else dish out revenge!|I have to get rid... of this burning inside me...
elif;game.check_dead('Pykroe') and game.check_alive('Guy')
    speak;Sal;I'm so sorry... Your leader...
    speak;Hyper;Pyk...|Your luck wasn't enough?|But how...?
    speak;Sal;Is there anything I can do to ease things...?
    speak;Hyper;No.|I'll just...{br}Argh! I'll kill them, ALL OF THEM!
    speak;Sal;I'll lend a han-
    speak;Hyper;No! Stand back!|I have to do this! FEEL MY RAGE!
else
    expression;Hyper;CloseEyes
    speak;Sal;I'm so sorry... Your crew...
    speak;Hyper;I am... too weak...|I couldn't stop it...
    speak;Sal;Our enemies are strong, if there's anything I can do to help...
    speak;Hyper;I might be too weak...|But... Please, massacre them all... ALL OF THEM!|I want to see... THEIR BLOOD SPILLED!|AAAAAAAAARGH!
    speak;Sal;...
end
multi_remove_portrait;Sal;Hyper
remove_talk;Sal;Hyper
